name: Death Dreadnaught
overview: Death Dreadnaught is a science fiction themed text adventure game for the TRS-80. The player has found themselves stranded on a spaceship filled with the gory remains of their former comrades. The player must explore the ship, avoiding the dangerous aliens that lurk about, and escape to safety. To accomplish this, the player must locate batteries, fresh food, oxygen, and fuel for the escape pod, as well as open the doors to the escape hatch. All commands are via VERB NOUN text entry, and there is no save or restore feature.
